title: Supplier Onboarding — Full Form (Integrated + Additional Fields)
description: Combined form: Supplier Intake, Supplier Master Data (16/17/18), Additional Supplier Fields, Procurement Internal, and Internal Accounts add-ons.

fields.name: Region (Please select only one location where you are going to send materials or provide services from the ...)
fields.description: Please select one Region from Mithapur, Ahmedabad, Mumbai, Pune, Mambattu, Cuddalore

subsections.title: 16.26 — Bank Details
subsections.description: Fill applicable fields (IBAN/SWIFT depending on country/bank).

fields.name: Legal Supplier Name (As per GST Certificate)
Proprietor Category: Please select Owner / proprietor / partner belongs to which category
Descriptions of Material/Services for tax identification purpose
Section 206AB supporting documents (Kindly download the doc & reupload with signoff)
Upload signed copy of Accepted Supplier Code of Conduct Declaration
fields.description: Reference file: Responsible Value Chain Partner Code of Conduct.pdf

fields.name: Acknowledgement: report any supplier code of conduct violations to the principal ethics counsellor
Willing to participate in TCL Audit?
Authorization dealer/distributor Certificate Details
fields.description: If you need structured certificate fields (issuer, expiry, cert #), capture them separately.

fields.name: Reason for No PAN
fields.description: Shown when PAN available is No.

fields.name: Registration/Partnership Deed/Address proof (letterhead or past invoice)
Description of attached supporting document
fields.description: Required when Add additional supporting documents is Yes.

fields.name: If yes, mention details (other business names)
fields.description: Shown when Business under any other names is Yes.

fields.name: Done business with Tata Chemicals under any other name in the past?
If yes, mention details (Tata other name past)
fields.description: Shown when Done business with Tata Chemicals under any other name is Yes.

fields.name: If yes, mention details (lawsuits)
fields.description: Shown when Lawsuits/legal actions is Yes.

fields.name: Any Show Cause notices from Govt authorities?
If yes, mention details (show cause notices)
fields.description: Shown when Show Cause notices is Yes.

fields.name: Ever been barred from business with any Tata group company?
Any officers/employees/close relatives working(ed) for Tata Chemical Limited?
If yes, names, dates, positions
fields.description: Shown when Relatives at TCL is Yes.

fields.name: Consent to operate from Pollution Control Board?
Factory License as per Factories Act 1948?
Pay minimum wages to employees & contractors?
Employees & contractor employees covered under PF?
No child labour (<18 years) in company facilities?
Do you want to block the Supplier?
